Deep within the Masaki home, all was quiet and sound. Save for a small closet under the stairs, where one could faintly hear the buzz and whirr of machines, and sometimes even a mad scientist's laugh.

"It's finally finished, MWA HA HA HA!! I am the greatest scientific genius the universe has ever known!" exclaimed the red, spiky haired scientist.

"You are the greatest Washu!" commented mini robot Washu 1.

"Yes Washu, you are truly great!" said the equally excited mini robot Washu 2.

"Yes, finally my greatest invention, the portable shrink ray, is finished," said Washu, but then with a sudden yawn added, "but it took me all night...I'd better hit the hay before I test it out tommorow. The world shall soon know my genius, HAHAHAHA!!"

And with that, she went to her bed with her praise robots chattering behind her.

But unknown to her, someone else had stumbled into her lab looking for her..

It just happens to be..

112.content:
Ayeka knew just where to find Ryoko; she was lazing around in the living room, watching TV, pigging out on instant noodles...but most importantly (to her) not doing any work.

"Well well, if she's going to act immature and slack off her chores, I'll have to discipline her like a child.” thought Ayeka. “But one thing is stopping me; her size.” Ayeka grinned as she said this and readied the gun.

“Ryoko, I’d like to talk to you about your lack of doing ANY kind of work around this household.”

“Yeah, what of it? You gonna try and make me little Miss Goody-good?”

“I can’t *make* you do anything, but I will have to punish you if you don’t agree to start doing some right now.” Ayeka couldn’t help but smirk as she knew what her answer would be.

“HELL NO! And if you even try to lay a finger on me I’ll lay you out!”

“I was hoping you’d say that, “giggled Ayeka.

And with that she fired the gun, hitting Ryoko square in the chest.

“Ha, that didn’t hurt at all. Guess you suck at picking out guns, huh?”

“Oh, it’s not meant to hurt you Ryoko…it’s meant to help me show you the error of your ways. In fact, I think you should be noticing the effects right about now.”

It was true. Ryoko’s clothing were swallowing her up, threatening to fall off her dwindling frame. Ayeka could not help but laugh hysterically. Seeing her once formidable rival being shrunk into a child’s toy was too much to bear.

“H-hey, what’s going on here? Why are you so damn tall??!?”

“Because of Washu’s wonderful new invention…now come here little Ryoko, you need to be punished for your naughty behavior!”

And with that, Ayeka grabbed the now 6-inch Ryoko out of her oversized clothes and took her over to the couch for the “punishment”.

Ayeka strolled down the hall, inspecting her newfound shrink device. She wasn't entirely sure where she was headed, but she was spared the decision when she ran into her sister, Sasami.

"Whatcha got there, sis?" Sasami asked, in her typical cheerful manner.

"Ah, just something I borrowed from Washu." Ayeka replied, contriving to hide the device from Sasami's sight.

"What does it do? It looks like a gun." Sasami said, clearly curious about the device.

"Err, nothing, it's for, um, watering plants."

"Really? Let me see it?"

"No, that's not necessary."

"Oh, come on sis, I wanna see it." Sasami grabbed at the device, causing Ayeka to attempt to hold it above her head, away from Sasami's grasp. Before she could do that, however, the device emitted a beam of light that grazed Ayeka's shoulder. She didn't notice, and held the contraption above her head, scolding Sasami for her rudeness.

"Ayeka!" Sasami whined, grasping at the apparatus in Ayeka's hands.

As Ayeka replied to Sasami's pleads, a curious change began to come over her. She was slowly getting shorter, the arm holding the shrink gun was descending closer to Sasami's reach. Ayeka didn't notice these changes until she found that Sasami's grabs were getting strangely close to their mark. She stopped admonishing Sasami to look down at herself. Her kimono was now fairly baggy on her, and seemed to be growing by the moment.

"Oh no!" Ayeka gasped. She momentarily forgot about the situation, which allowed Sasami to snatch the shrink device away from her. Ayeka shouted and lunged after Sasami, but tripped on her kimono, which had engulfed her shrinking feet.

Sasami watched as Ayeka laid on the floor, seeming to slowly melt within the frame of her kimono.

After a moment, Ayeka stood up. Her kimono was now much too large for her, covering her hands in its lengthy sleeves, and one of her shoulders was visible through its collar. She turned to Sasami, and was surprised to find that she had to look up into her little sister's eyes.

Sasami looked at her miniaturized sister, then looked at the gunlike device in her hand.

What does Sasami do?

I was tired of reading all the anime giantess threads and never seeing one about Tenchi, despite how many girls there are and their relationships with one another. So now there is one. Basically, you can add anything you want, I won't delete much. Just keep the violence/foot fetish to a minimum (not that there can't be some =)). *Edit* Damn, I'm loving all the chapter's you guys have been adding. They're all very well written and quite descriptive =). Keep it up guys. I added another chapter of my own, and will probably continue to do a few more in the following days to try and spur on more additions.
